heading.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Product names

grids.product_catalog: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-x-6 gap-y-12

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-[#0A0A0A] hover:bg-[#F9F9F5] transition-all duration-300 font-medium px-8 py-3 rounded-full uppercase tracking-wider text-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#D4AF37] text-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-[#0A0A0A] transition-all duration-300 px-8 py-3 rounded-full uppercase tracking-wider text-sm
buttons.ghost: text-[#F5F5F0] hover:text-[#D4AF37] transition-colors uppercase tracking-widest text-xs

cards.feature: bg-[#121212] border border-white/5 p-8 hover:border-[#D4AF37]/30 transition-colors duration-500

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-[#D4AF37] rounded-none px-0 py-4 text-[#F5F5F0] placeholder:text-white/30 focus:ring-0 transition-colors

hero.alt: Artistic composition of luxury oxford shoes on vintage newspaper

men_collection.alt: Sleek black leather oxford shoe detail

women_collection.alt: Editorial shot of woman in blue dress with elegant heels

sports_collection.alt: Clean white athletic shoe on road surface

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: relative after:absolute after:inset-0 after:border after:border-[#D4AF37] after:opacity-0 hover:after:opacity-100 after:transition-opacity after:duration-500
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Configure 'tailwind.config.js' to use the specific colors defined in this JSON. Extend the theme, do not overwrite completely.
3. FONTS: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in 'index.css'.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Marketing' grid for the Landing Page. Do not use simple rows.
5. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove the 'default Vercel look'. Use the 'buttons.primary' and 'inputs.default' styles defined here.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. MOTION: Apply 'fade_in_up' to all major sections on scroll.
8. NAVIGATION: Create a sticky glassmorphic header that reveals on scroll-up.
9. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors must be rich (tinted), not pure black (except for the specific #0A0A0A background).
Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards against the dark background.
